sections.html:
Try these quick tools: (1) 5-4-3-2-1 sensory scan, (2) slow exhale breathing (exhale longer than inhale), (3) name the feeling without fighting it, (4) feet-to-floor pressure + shoulder release, (5) a small next action (drink water, text someone, step outside). These don’t “remove” anxiety instantly, but they reduce intensity and bring you back to the present.

Note: This content is educational and not a diagnosis.
